name:
Banque centrale européenne - rapport annuel 2021 - European Central Bank – annual report 2020
 - Europäische Zentralbank – Jahresbericht 2020 -  - Sven Simon - Am 5
green_remark: Badly worded, but okay in terms of content. Refers to activation of escape clause in Stability and Growth Pact; calls for it to remain in place for as long as economically needed.
title: European Central Bank – annual report 2020
